title: Sharp & Mark of Soft White Underbelly Gets Emotional & Come Full Circle
description:
Since his first interview on Soft White Underbelly, Sharp has been the new polarizing personality of podcasting! Today, Sharp turns the table on Mark to talk about his come up, his goals with Soft White, fatherhood and more. https://www.instagram.com/soft_white_... https://www.youtube.com/c/SoftWhiteUn... ----- NO JUMPER PATREON http://www.patreon.com/nojumper CHECK OUT OUR NEW SPOTIFY PLAYLIST https://open.spotify.com/playlist/5te...
